com.totsp.gwittir.client.flow
Interface HistoryManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleSessionHistoryManager
public interface HistoryManager

A HistoryManager is a class that parses history tokens and logs transitions to control the global state of the FlowController.

Author:
Robert "kebernet" Cooper

Method Summary
 void apply(java.lang.String historyToken)
          Applies a state on the historyToken

transition

void transition(FlowEvent event,
                boolean appendHistory)
Called when the flow controller transitions between states.

Parameters:
name - name of the new state
old - the old BoundWidget being transitioned from
current - the new BoundWidget being transitioned to.
